thread.section_title: etrailer Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of etrailer | etrailer.com
thread.title: Anthony Cordice

author: Anthony Cordice
title: Anthony Cordice
text: Asked if anyoneone knew of a factory update about the lack of water seal Used to seal the case halfs .read several reviews about how months down the road the unit suddenly stopped working for no apparent reason. Upon inspection when the broken unit was opened up , it was lacking a water seal and full of water . Other wise everyone was very satisfied with the unit up to that point . Seams a unit attached to the out side back of a pick up truck should be made to be extreamly water resistant . I don't expect to go scuba diving with it. But it should stand up to rain, snow and the elements with everyday reasonable use .
